meanings.sent1: I counted up to eighty candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: There are eighty students in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: Why did the math book blush? Because it saw the number eighty and eight flirting!
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as strong as eighty horses pulling a carriage.
meanings.sent5: The eighty balloons filled the room with color and joy.

meanings.definition: A group or set of eighty.
meanings.sent1: The bakery baked eighty cookies for the party.
meanings.sent2: There were eighty trees planted in the park.
meanings.sent3: Why did the music teacher bring eighty pencils to the concert? In case they needed to draw a sharp note!
meanings.sent4: The team worked together like eighty gears in a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered with eighty flowers, each one unique and beautiful.
